summary: Example script that configures and runs a Megatron‑based Stable Diffusion model for inference, applying a configuration modifier, initializing a trainer, and executing the text‑to‑image pipeline to generate images from prompts.
business_intent: Demonstrate how to perform text‑to‑image generation with a pre‑trained Stable Diffusion model in NeMo, enabling users to quickly prototype and integrate diffusion‑based image synthesis into their workflows.
